result.title: Modelling guideline document and demonstration development kit (update)
result.description: Deliverable D4.6 (and thus D4.4) is a “cookbook” guideline document for transforming developed models into a suitable form for the optimisations of WP5. This guideline is not restricted to the use case, but will rather take into account the generalisability of the model-based decomposition-coordination optimisation. The deliverable will include a demonstration implementation.

result.title: Report on survey findings
result.description: Based on the results and outcomes of the DSM-, mobility pattern- and experience curve surveys, a report will be written, describing the findings, new insights and results of the surveys. result.title: CATALYST Specification & Design
result.description: This deliverable will analyse the CATALYST use cases so as to capture the user requirements based on which the requirements for the CATALYST framework and subsystem in terms of functionality, interfaces (hardware and software) and information flow will be identified. It will also specify the CATALYST framework architecture and interfaces between IT and Energy components.
